subject: VAM
description_text:
Hello. I ordered today VAMs and some other stuff. I paid 164 USD (with
shipping). That is 142 EUR. So my question is, you will pay VAT, and i do
not have to pay any other tax. On you page you say you will pay VAT under
150 eur.
Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Ante,    Yes, our system experienced an outage, but it has now been resolved.
